title: Software Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Learning Simulation for Evidence-Based Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Research Methodology Knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform the 5 stages of Evidence-Based Medicine (EBM) (formulating questions, literature search, critical appraisal, application, evaluation) with 80% accuracy based on clinical scenarios
Learners can establish treatment plans applying EBM principles through patient diagnosis simulations in a mobile VR environment
Learners strengthen critical thinking by improving EBM cases over 3+ iterations based on peer review feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
